title: Nurse at McMaster Children's Hospital tests positive for COVID-19 - CBC.ca
description: Nurse at McMaster Children's Hospital tests positive for COVID-19 CBC.ca 2nd nurse in Hamilton to test positive for COVID-19 CHCH News 'You get to see people again:' HHS combating COVID-19 loneliness with virtual visits CBC.ca Hamilton hospital nurse tests po…
content:
Hamilton Health Sciences has confirmed a nurse who works at McMaster Children's Hospital has tested positive for COVID-19.
